name: Well Well Well, if it ain't the Invisible Hunt
name_original: Well Well Well, if it ain't the Invisible Hunt
description:
Have you ever wish that you could get rid of those annoying people in clubs? Well if not, now you will. Your goal is to find yourself,find the other players and get em out of the club you love so much. 

Featuring Music by Shah,  dive right into the chaos and become the king of the club.

Controllers required. 2-4 players minimum. Use left analog stick to move the character and X/A button to smite your enemies.

The Bubble Buddiez:

Benedict Ahunu - 3D Art

Lucas do Carmo - Programming

Archie Cruz - Level Design, Animation, Programming and Game Design

Jacub Day - UI/UX Design and Game Design

Anna Lopez - 3D Art

Shahwaiz Rizvi - Music

Shayan Salehirad - Level Design and Moral Support
